Nightlight::

Nightlight smiled when Trinity appeared and she said weakly "Hello 
little girl"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Trinity::
> 
> She heard her friend's voice and went running down the hall. "Hey, 
I'm here. 
> What's going on?" She yawned big and smiled. "I kind of took a 
kitty nap 
> huh?"  She ran up and hugged Aerotaur.
> 
> 
> 
> -------O.M.--------
> >::Aerotaur::
> >     "Calm down.  Everything's okay."  He tilts his head to one 
side.  "I 
> >hear
> >Trinity now.  Trinity!  Come here."
>
